page.title: 16LIFE IN BINGHAM (1)
page.content: On this page and the few following are comments from children between the ages of 6 and 13. Each comment is to do with what they think of living in Bingham. "I like Bingham because it is a quiet and peaceful village." "I like Bingham because it is not too small to be a village and not too big to be a town." "I like to take walks when it's raining because I like being beneath an umbrella and there is nobody around." "I like Bingham because of the Sports Centre and for the swimming baths." "One of the things I like about Bingham is that it has almost everything in one place." "It's near the countryside."
